description.line1: As a passionate Front-end Web and Mobile developer, I stand out for my perfectionist approach to user interface creation. I systematically aim for pixel-perfect fidelity with every design, while keeping a critical and constructive eye. This approach enables me to be proactive, identifying and suggesting relevant UI and UX improvements.
description.line2: My mastery of the latest front-end technologies enables me to develop modern, high-performance solutions that are perfectly adapted to users' needs. I integrate quickly into teams and adapt easily to different development methodologies.
description.line3: Able to faithfully translate mock-ups into functional interfaces, I'm ready to make a significant contribution to raising the quality of your web and mobile projects. If you're looking for a front-end developer who combines technical expertise and creativity, I'd be delighted to bring my added value to your company.
description.line4: Looking forward to working with you, please contact me to discuss your projects!

descriptions.soci3ty: Development of the landing page and dApp for The Soci3ty, a networking platform for Web3 professionals, enabling them to offer their services and expand their network.
descriptions.leequid:
Development of the landing page and dApp for Leequid, a liquid staking platform on the Lukso blockchain.

  • Connections with various wallets and interactions with Smart Contracts
  • Pages: Stake / Unstake / Swap / Add & Remove liquidity
  • Claim / Auto-compound rewards
  • Statistics / Rewards analysis
  • Leequid / Lukso metrics page
descriptions.appunto:
WeDoData

Development of the “A story of Political Conflict” website, a project funded by the European Research Council (ERC), on behalf of the WeDoData agency. Visualization and comparison of French political and socio-demographic data.

Usense

Development of the mobile application for the system used by Usense, a medtech developing a medical device combined with artificial intelligence for urinary analysis, and its administrator panel.

Monuma

Complete redesign of an administrator panel. Monuma operates in the expertise, valuation and traceability of art objects, based on Blockchain technology.
